title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 16
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

With a relatively flat stage on the cards, there was no shake-up in the fight for the red jersey in Stage 16. Eiking remains on top after coming in to the finish in Santa Cruz de Bezana with the main peloton.

1. Odd Christian Eiking
2. Guillaume Martin +0:54
3. Primož Roglič +1:36
4. Enric Mas +2:11
5. Miguel Angel Lopez +3:04
6. Jack Haig +3:35
7. Egan Bernal +4:21
8. Adam Yates +4:34
9. Sepp Kuss +4:59
10. Felix Großschartner +5:31

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 250 points
2. Matteo Trentin - 123 points
3. Magnus Cort - 114 points
4. Michael Matthews - 110 points
5. Alberto Dainese - 109 points

La Vuelta Stage 17 Preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Romain Bardet - 50 points
2. Damiano Caruso - 31 points
3. Rafał Majka - 29 points
4. Michael Storer - 24 points
5. Pavel Sivakov - 16 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Aleksandr Vlasov + 1:43
3. Gino Mäder +2:26
4. Juan Pedro Lopez +6:47
5. Rémy Rochas +22:14

Team Classification

1. Ineos Grenadiers
2. UAE Team Emirates +3:40
3. Bahrain-Victorious +6:48
4. Movistar Team +15:41
5. Team Jumbo Visma +17:41

Cover image: Justin Setterfield/Getty Images
author: Peter Stuart
